DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety efficacy high low strength ME1111 solution compare vehicle treatment onychomycosis toenail .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study ME1111 Patients With Onychomycosis
DOC.criteria: Mild moderate distal lateral subungual onychomycosis A positive potassium hydroxide ( KOH ) microscopy A positive fungal culture dermatophyte Good general health Uncontrolled diabetes Onychomycosis fingernail Prior use antifungal drug ( Failure complete specify washout period ) History HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C Diagnosis psoriasis history psoriasis Participated trial investigational drug device within 30 day participation research study concurrent study Pregnancy/lactation
